title: COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6.48ft², 600W Dehydrated Dryer, 6 Stainless Steel Trays, 48H Timer, 165°F Temperature Control, for Herbs, Meat, Fruit, and Yogurt, Silver
descriptions:
Introducing the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky - your ultimate solution for drying and preserving your favorite foods! Designed in California, this powerful 600W dehydrator boasts a large drying space of 6.48ft², perfect for drying fruits, herbs, meat, and even making homemade yogurt. With 6 stainless steel trays, each measuring 12 x 13 inches, you can dehydrate in bulk with ease.

The COSORI Food Dehydrator features hot air circulation from a rear fan, ensuring even drying at temperatures ranging from 95°F to 165°F. The digital control panel with touch-control LED display makes it easy to set the timer for up to 48 hours and adjust the temperature to your desired level. The trays are dishwasher-safe for easy cleanup, and the dehydrator operates quietly, producing less than 48dB of noise.

Safety is a top priority with the COSORI Food Dehydrator. It features auto shut-off and overheat protection, so you can dehydrate with peace of mind. The dehydrator also comes with a glass door, allowing you to monitor the drying process without opening the unit.

The COSORI Food Dehydrator includes 50 delicious recipes to get you started, as well as additional accessories such as a mesh screen and fruit roll sheet. It's compatible with USA and Canada voltage and operates at a frequency of 60Hz.

Upgrade your kitchen and preserve your favorite foods with the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky. Order yours today and experience the convenience and versatility of food dehydration!
